title: MacBook Pro 13-inch (2020) first look
description: The new 13-inch MacBook Pro has a Magic Keyboard and the option to get a 10th Gen Intel Core processor. Apple has finally killed the butterfly keyboard. In our early testing it performs way better than expected. This is more than a spec bump.  Read more:   If you buy something from a Verge link, Vox Media may earn a commission. Seeour ethics policy:   Buy the new 13-inch MacBook Pro at Apple:   Subscribe:  Subscribe to Verge Science:   Community guidelines:  Wallpapers from The Verge:
